HERO.TITLE: Full Stack Software Engineer
HERO.SUBTITLE_1: Building scalable platforms with Angular 18+, Node.js and MongoDB, creating hybrid solutions oriented to high availability.
HERO.SUBTITLE_2: My focus is on Clean Architecture and extreme optimization for high-volume environments.
HERO.SUDO_ERP: Creator of SUDO ERP, an Offline-First platform with real-time synchronization.

ABOUT.TITLE: My Engineering Philosophy
ABOUT.TEXT_1: I understand software development as a strategic business tool, not just a technical task. My differential value lies in the ability to translate commercial objectives into resilient architectures that scale with demand.
ABOUT.TEXT_2: Beyond code, I focus on long-term maintainability, resource optimization, and end-user experience. I firmly believe that a robust system is one that works invisibly and efficiently, allowing the business to grow without technical friction.

TECH_STACK.TITLE: Tech Stack & Architecture
TECH_STACK.SUBTITLE: Strategic selection of robust tools to build critical, scalable, and high-performance digital ecosystems.

FRONTEND.TITLE: Frontend & Desktop Ecosystem
FRONTEND.DESC: Development of complex reactive interfaces and native desktop applications, focusing on fluid user experience and optimized performance.

BACKEND.TITLE: Backend & Data Layer
BACKEND.DESC: Building robust and scalable APIs. Design of hybrid data schemas (SQL/NoSQL) and use of advanced Aggregations for efficient processing.

ARCHITECTURE.TITLE: Architecture, DevOps & Security
ARCHITECTURE.DESC: Quality assurance and operational continuity through decoupled architectures, security strategies (JWT), and resilient synchronization for critical environments.
